fullText: Patrick Stewart and Ian McKellen bring their considerable star power and decades of classical training to bear on Samuel Beckett's existential masterpiece, but the real surprise is how funny they make this bleak meditation on the human condition.
dtliExcerpt: Patrick Stewart and Ian McKellen bring their considerable star power and decades of classical training to bear on Samuel Beckett's existential masterpiece, but the real surprise is how funny they make this bleak meditation on the human condition.
